comments:
My host process crashed, after restarting it a build initiated in my workspace.  During the build I got the following NPE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.BundleErrorReporter.validateSingleton(BundleErrorReporter.java:182)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.BundleErrorReporter.validateBundleSymbolicName(BundleErrorReporter.java:165)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.BundleErrorReporter.validateContent(BundleErrorReporter.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.checkFile(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:97)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.checkThisProject(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:50)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.build(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:603)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:167)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:201)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$1.run(BuildManager.java:230)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:233)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuildLoop(BuildManager.java:252)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.build(BuildManager.java:285)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.doBuild(AutoBuildJob.java:145)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.run(AutoBuildJob.java:208)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Created an attachment (id=40218)
Patch

The patch is a paranoid null check that exits the validation if the model is null, e.g. if we had a problem reading the file.

Given that the manifest error reporter runs quite frequently, this should be addressed for 3.2 as we don't want to fill the user log with NPEs.

Post-3.2, we could investigate more sophisticated solutions.

+1 for RC3

Dejan, we need one more approval.
